update tbl_walkthrough
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
image_path = #{imagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tbl_walkthrough set order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, image_path = #{imagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, thumb_image_path = #{thumbImagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, privacy = #{privacy,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select a.member_id,a.benaco_scan_id,a.description,b.thumb_image_path,a.create_time from tbl_order a,tbl_walkthrough b where a.id=b.order_id and a.status=2 and b.privacy=0
